  • Konstruktordetails

    • POSToSentenceSampleStream

      public POSToSentenceSampleStream(Detokenizer detokenizer, ObjectStream<POSSample> samples, int chunkSize)
      Initializes a POSToSentenceSampleStream.
      Parameter:
      detokenizer - The Detokenizer to use. Must not be null.
      samples - The samples as input. Must not be null.
      chunkSize - The size of chunks. Must be equal to or greater than 0.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if parameters are invalid.
